title: New: VÉRITÉ – Weekend
body:
NY’s **VÉRITÉ** showed her popstar potential on her debut track, _Strange Enough_, and has now followed it up with an equally as impressive second outing, _Weekend_.

A glamorous cross between the elegance of Lana Del Rey and the heart-on-sleeve, pop-punk of Paramore, it’s self-assured and a further step towards her being catapulted into the limelight. Check out Weekend below.
